mapper.select:
SELECT customer_car_info_code AS customerCarInfoCode, bs_code as bsCode, customer_code AS customerCode, customer_car_ number AS customerCarNumber, vendor_code AS vendorCode, rc_code AS rcCode, car_production_year AS carProductionYear, car_registration_date AS carRegistrationDate, last_distance_driven AS lastDistanceDriven, last_visit_date AS lastVisitDate, customer_car_info_writer AS customerCarInfoWriter, customer_car_info_date AS customerCarInfoDate
FROM customer_car_info_table
